pages.text: There, I found that a woman rules over them. She has been given all sorts of things, and she has a splendid throne
I found her and her people worshipping the sun instead of Allah. Shaitan has made their deeds seem delightful to them. He alienates them from the (straight) path, so they do not find the way
That is because they do not prostrate before Allah Who reveals the unseen mysteries of the heavens and the earth. He knows what you hide and what you reveal
Allah! There is no god but He, the Lord of the great throne
(Sulaiman) said, "We will see if you told the truth or you happen to be a liar
Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then retreat, and watch what reply they give in return
(The queen) said, "Oh my courtiers, a noteworthy letter has been delivered to me
It is from Sulaiman, and it begins with ´In the name of Allah, the most Merciful and the most Beneficent´
And says that, "You are not mightier (than me) so submit to me willingly
The queen said, "Oh my courtiers, give your opinion in this matter before me. I do not conclude any matter unless you are present (and unless I consult you, first)
They said, "We, as a nation, possess great strength and courage. But the decision is yours. Consider the situation and decide what you must
She said, "When the kings invade a land they undermine (its system), topple its respected and privileged class, and deem it to be despised and inferior. That is what they do
I am going to send him a gift. I will observe the response received by my envoys
